Sentencas: Yttrium titanate Y2Ti2O7 is an important member of the pyrochlore family because it exhibits various properties which make it suitable for potential applications in different fields.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of Ca2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: In the present study, influence of doping of CaO (0.1 <= x <= 0.4) for Y2Ti2O7 system was investigated.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of Ca2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: The lattice parameter, electrical conductivity, X-ray analysis, Fourier Transform-Infrared Spectroscopy (FTIR) and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) were obtained in-order to study its suitability in the field of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of Ca2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: The results show that doping of Ca ion on the Y-site plays an important role to determine electrical, thermal as well as structural properties.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of Ca2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: Moreover, it was observed that sintering up to 1550 degrees C for 12 h results in the formation of single Y2Ti2O7 cubic pyrochlore phase.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of Ca2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC

Sentencas: In addition to this, structural studies including both SEM/EDX analysis were done to determine grain size as well as porosity in the system.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity, structural and thermal properties of Ca2+ doped Y2Ti2O7 pyrochlores for SOFC
